Package me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.inventory.gui

Class PlayerDynamicGUI<E>

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.inventory.gui.GUI
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.inventory.gui.PlayerGUI
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.inventory.gui.PlayerDynamicGUI<E>
Type Parameters:
E - - Optional parameter for update method.
public abstract class PlayerDynamicGUI<E> extends PlayerGUI
This GUI provides a nicer way to update the inventory, clearing all click events and items before settings everything up.
